name: Hermes: The Fury of Megaera
description:
HISTORY:
An ancient rivalry resurfaces. Meet Megaera, a vengeful being with a dark past. Banished and feared, she found solace in her ominous lair, surrounded by suffering and horror. Fueled by resentment and a thirst for power, she has set her sights on Aphrodite, the embodiment of beauty and allure.



Megaera's malevolent plan unfolds as she unveils her scheme to transform Aphrodite into a lifeless stone sculpture. The festival becomes a battleground between good and evil, and the fate of Aphrodite hangs in the balance.



Hermes must venture deep into the heart of Megaera's lair to find her. Along the way, he’ll face challenges, encounter strange creatures, and unravel the truth behind Aphrodite's disappearance. With each step, the mystery deepens, and the danger intensifies.

As the pieces of the puzzle come together, Hermes seeks aid from his fellow gods and goddesses. Together, they must confront Megaera, halt her nefarious plans, and rescue Aphrodite before it's too late.



Prepare to be enthralled by stunning landscapes, face formidable foes, and engage in strategic battles. Uncover hidden secrets, solve intricate puzzles, and restore harmony to the realms. The fate of Olympus and the very essence of beauty itself rest in your hands. Will you rise to the challenge, join the gods and goddesses in their quest, and become a hero of legend? The time to act is now. Download and embark on this extraordinary journey. The Summer Solstice Festival awaits, and the destiny of Aphrodite hangs in the balance.

Upsell Features

50 exciting levels;
Three difficulty modes: Easy, Normal and Hard;
Develop your settlement: complete levels and use stars to build and improve the settlement;
Find all collectible items in the levels;
Loads of achievements;
Intuitive gameplay with simple mouse actions.
